entry.title: WIND WARNING , Parrsboro
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:08 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 10.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parrsboro 11:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 10.0°C
Wind: ESE 40 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 10 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy with risk of thundershowers. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 60 gusting to 90 this evening then southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to 10 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Amount 10 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
